title: Oru Raja Vanthanam Lyrics Mounam Samatham Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Oru Raja Vandhanaam
enakoru roja thandhanaam
adi vaadi raasathi
unakoru muththam
endraanaam

avan oorai sollu
perai sollaadhe
avan aasai thannai
thaandi sellaadhe (2)

Oru Raja Vandhanaam
enakoru roja thandhanaam
adi vaadi raasathi
unakoru muththam
endraanaam

Thai maasam pongal vaikum
neram vandhaachu
thazhambu engum pooththu
vaasam vandhaachu

Veedengum vaasaal engum
kolam pottachu
vizhiyodu yaekkam vandhu
thookkam poyaachu

oru poongaaththu
adhu soodaachu.
vizh thazh pottu
pala naal aachu

adi pen maanae
idhu yaaraale
adi rasaaththi
vandhu koorendi

Oru Raja Vandhanaam
enakoru roja thandhanaam
adi vaadi raasathi
unakoru muththam
endraanaam

Maharani pattam kaatum
endhan selvaakku
varavendum maalai
vaanil thanga pallaakku

vali engum kondrai pookkal
ponnai thoovattum.
varaverkka vaanam paadi
paattu paadattum

ini oorengum
en rajaangam
adi naal dhorum
varum oorgolam

Oru Raja Vandhanaam
enakoru roja thandhanaam
adi vaadi raasathi
unakoru muththam
endraanaam

avan oorai sollu
perai sollaadhe
avan aasai thannai
thaandi sellaadhe (2)
